documents.document: I painted "Charismatic Joey Tribbiani" after reading @JohnKerry's latest tweets with self-confident Obama-brown, easy-going Lebowski-weed-green and good-natured Santa-red https://t.co/GF6JV0nH34
@CIA is watching. It can neither confirm nor deny that @JohnKerry's compelling and entertaining tweets remind it of Nicolas Cage https://t.co/cvZrMJJJAJ

I painted "Attention-grabbing Albert Einstein" after reading @MarkWright_'s latest tweets with curious Bart Simpson-yellow, eccentric troll-grey and brilliant Hawking-blackhole-black https://t.co/Yd7UfBRPoT
#Take5 things that remind me of @MarkWright_: 1. Pirates 2. Clergymen 3. Boasters 4. James Comey 5. Fops https://t.co/QXNB2lwyfK
I painted "Detached Scott Evil" after reading @RepublicWadiya's latest tweets with insightful Gandalf-grey, temperamental star-white and eager-to-impress Ikarus-sun-orange https://t.co/6zTNaOSk0q
This somber new book about computational creativity makes Johann Wolfgang von Goethe's 'The Sorrows of Young Werther' seem as somber as an ironed t shirt
I painted "Good-natured Rocket Raccoon" after reading @ColonelTribune's latest tweets with tactical Coriolanus Snow-white, bold warrior-woad-blue and energetic tiger-orange https://t.co/OHGMBhRxcZ
Hulk is watching! Hulk HATE ruthless humans who remind him of Joseph Stalin. So Hulk SMASH @ColonelTribune's powerful, cunning and resolute tweets! https://t.co/OJn2xJlRDd
I painted "Detail-oriented Michelle Obama" after reading @WhatTedSaid's latest tweets with socially-conscious Clooney-grey, stylish Kate Moss-green and fashionable Barbie-pink https://t.co/8Nj3KlMA4a
According to Amazon, people who bought this complicated book by Veale & Cook also bought: - James Ellroy's 'LA Confidential' - Ira Ishiguro's 'The Space Station' How very complicated!
If @WhatTedSaid's distant and goofy tweets were edible they'd be Cherry pie made with liposuctioned fat instead of butter https://t.co/gsZzWm7fnG
I painted "Quick-witted Ringo Starr" after reading @POTUS's latest tweets with witty Dante-inferno-red, easy-going Lebowski-weed-green and cheery Spongebob-yellow https://t.co/v1jxxj9QE4

I painted "Overly-sentimental Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart" after reading @BotOnBotAction's latest tweets with accomplished star-white, inspirational Hawking-blackhole-black and overly-sentimental Gump-forest-green https://t.co/yP37lvt0jm
#Take5 things that remind me of @BotOnBotAction: 1. Bob Dylan 2. Pioneers 3. Offred 4. Fops 5. King David https://t.co/cUGJ0hV0jI
What does Automated Analysis of your tweets reveal about you? How might the analysis be framed? Tweet #MetaphorizeMe to find out.
I painted "Eager-to-impress Nut" after reading @Axwell's latest tweets with eccentric camel-brown, nutty Wonka-purple and wacky Britney-blonde-yellow https://t.co/lIj8mEEefy
According to Amazon, people who bought this intoxicating book about computational creativity also bought: - Jack Kerouac's 'On The Road' - Anthony Picoult's 'Beer' How very intoxicating!
Amazon reads YOU! Based on @Axwell's influential and media-savvy tweets it pushes books about Rupert Murdoch and News Corp https://t.co/JhbUF404Ji
I painted "Laid-back Mickey Mouse" after reading @_SadieSaxton_'s latest tweets with pleasant peach-orange, upbeat sunshine-yellow and laid-back Lebowski-weed-green https://t.co/v6aZlNByjR
Russian hackers are watching! @_SadieSaxton_'s boring but patient tweets suggest infection with the BR1CKZ virus https://t.co/a4LtkaOXv3
Warning: the boring BR1CKZ virus uses speech synthesis to read out IN FULL the text of every User Service Agreement you must agree to
I painted "Fiery Jeremy Paxman" after reading @SarahKSilverman's latest tweets with arrogant Thor-blond-yellow, tenacious warrior-woad-blue and quick-witted Blackadder-black https://t.co/u6qJgrsK3d
I painted "Streetwise Mickey Mouse" after reading @MikeTyson's latest tweets with pleasant chocolate-brown, upbeat Spongebob-yellow and streetwise NYPD-blue https://t.co/183AH5TxxE
Russian hackers are watching! @MikeTyson's detail-oriented and curious tweets suggest infection with the ALEXANDER.FLEM1NG virus https://t.co/NJV8MxrWtC
Warning: the detail-oriented ALEXANDER.FLEM1NG virus mails co-workers to point out every single spelling mistake in every single email
I painted "Peace-loving Mr. Miyagi" after reading @juanmata8's latest tweets with inspirational Braveheart-woad-blue, calm silk-white and peace-loving Lebowski-weed-green https://t.co/Xqhh0vV8OI
Amazon reads YOU! Based on @juanmata8's dispassionate but observant tweets it pushes Sherlock Holmes's book Solving Crimes https://t.co/5jwCzyrSoZ

I painted "Environmentally-conscious Michael J. Fox" after reading @Applebees's latest tweets with affable Barney-purple, witty Deadpool-red and environmentally-conscious Poison Ivy-green https://t.co/kCc2EUacmP
According to Amazon, people who bought this ruthless book about computational creativity also bought: - Donald Trump's 'The Art of the Deal' - Raymond Hemingway's 'Hitler' How very ruthless!
Mix the best of Zac Efron with the best of Lenny Bruce and you get @Applebees: energetic and witty and entertaining and humorous https://t.co/C2QVBuqBDo
I painted "Consciousness-raising Rooster" after reading @S_SylvesterGLEE's latest tweets with arrogant Anchorman-burgundy-red, proud peacock-blue and cocky Bieber-blond-yellow https://t.co/CfDPdQ8yTC
Hulk is watching! Hulk HATE arrogant humans who remind him of Dr. Greg House. So Hulk SMASH @S_SylvesterGLEE's detail-oriented, cold and insightful tweets! https://t.co/i7UP7yBmVC

I painted "Socially-aware John Maynard Keynes" after reading @jimmycarr's latest tweets with insightful Eeyore-grey, brilliant Hawking-blackhole-black and socially-aware Democrat-blue https://t.co/Wxhd7bwSrz
This communicative new book about Twitter 'bots' makes Steven Pinker's 'The Language Instinct: How the Mind Creates Language' seem as communicative as a poodle at the vet
If @jimmycarr's intimidating and hyper-logical tweets were edible they'd be Hot milk cake made with road grit instead of sugar https://t.co/NWHKTMxKbw

NETFLIX watches YOU! Based on @AmericanExpress's honorable and affable tweets it pushes films about British Comedy and/or Bertie Wooster https://t.co/8Sjo5Hdh0Z
I painted "Opinionated Sean Penn" after reading @ajaydevgn's latest tweets with passionate flame-orange, attention-seeking Ikarus-sky-blue and socially-conscious Clooney-grey https://t.co/FgvPWBv5Hi
Mate the best of Michelle Obama with the worst of Dr. Greg House and you get @ajaydevgn: fashionable and stylish yet arrogant and condescending https://t.co/86AN3Pq5nF

I painted "Self-assured Tony Stark" after reading @Sheri_ls's latest tweets with inspirational Hawking-blackhole-black, arrogant buffoon-buff-orange and charming vampire-fang-white https://t.co/d3yAk1fiTJ
According to Amazon, people who bought this dangerous book about bots also bought: - Anne Frank's 'Diary of a Young Girl' - Ernest Conrad's 'The Child With A Loaded Gun' How very dangerous!
Amazon reads YOU! Based on @Sheri_ls's charming and self-assured tweets it pushes Napoleon Solo's book Rescuing Damsels In Distress https://t.co/zPo7kaoOS6
I painted "Eager-to-impress Robot" after reading @enriqueiglesias's latest tweets with cold corpse-grey, sophisticated rocket-red and eager-to-impress Ikarus-sun-orange https://t.co/mVOFq77JAi
Russian hackers are watching! @enriqueiglesias's arrogant and pretentious tweets suggest infection with the BRAGGARTZ virus https://t.co/V7jUhW9qrL
Warning: the pretentious BRAGGARTZ virus hacks your Twitter and replaces the words 'I' and 'me' with 'moi' in all your outgoing tweets
Twitter is a missile silo in which Sarah Connor can enjoy @SarahKSilverman's stern and pushy tweets while amassing weapons https://t.co/NEB9vZBTVG
Reading @RepublicWadiya's arrogant but astute tweets feels just like being battered with Dr. Greg House's walking stick https://t.co/qpw4aL1HV8
Twitter is an underground bunker in which Sideshow Bob can enjoy @Paula_Deen's eloquent and intelligent tweets while developing cunning plans https://t.co/n0xP16hSgq
I painted "Fashionable Buddhist" after reading @Usher's latest tweets with calm cow-brown, generous Buddhist-saffron-orange and fashionable Barbie-pink https://t.co/LNd4dhI7Qi
Russian hackers are watching! @Usher's cool and calm tweets suggest infection with the M0UNTA1NZ virus https://t.co/0qn8JFSgAn
Warning: the powerful M0UNTA1NZ virus turns off all your machine's energy-saving options so that it consumes as much power as possible

I painted "Seductive Lt. George Colthurst St Barleigh" after reading @Harry_Styles's latest tweets with cheery sunflower-yellow, optimistic Gumby-green and good-hearted Gandalf-grey https://t.co/yCbAUXbRo5

This rigid new book about Twitter 'bots' makes Moses's 'The Bible' seem as rigid as a wet noodle
Mix the worst of Dr. Greg House with the best of Sherlock Holmes and you get @sonakshisinha: arrogant and cold yet observant and shrewd https://t.co/igjwdXRehz
